content:
# The Wooden Chest has been successfully placed at the designated position, and my inventory now contains:
# - Stone Furnace: 1
# - Wood: 6
# - Coal: 5
# - Iron Plates: 3
#
# The entities on the map include:
# - Wooden Chest (positioned at (0.5, 0.5))
# - Stone Furnace (currently has 4 coal but is not smelting due to a lack of ingredients)
#
# Now that I have a storage solution, I can transfer excess resources to the Wooden Chest for better organization.
# 
# Next, I will move resources such as wood and coal into the Wooden Chest to free up space in my inventory for further crafting and gathering.

# Moving resources (wood and coal) into the Wooden Chest for storage.
insert_item(Prototype.Wood, target_chest_position, quantity=6)  # Move all wood to the chest.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target_chest_position, quantity=5)  # Move all coal to the chest.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after moving items to the chest.
